text: 9|47|avarkaḷ uṅkaḷuṭaṉ vantiruntāl oḻuṅkīṉattait tavira (vēṟu etaiyum) uṅkaḷukku atikarikkac ceytirukka māṭṭārkaḷ. Viṣamattaik karuti uṅkaḷ mattiyil alaṅkōlattaiyum uṇṭu paṇṇi iruppārkaḷ. Avarkaḷuṭaiya oṟṟarkaḷum uṅkaḷuṭaṉ irukkiṉṟaṉar. Āṉāl, allāh (ittakaiya) aniyāyakkārarkaḷai naṉkaṟintavaṉ āvāṉ
